Articles.Content:
The KR-177 is a Airborne Warning and Control System (AWACS) it was designed to detect threats and control assets in the battlespace. It was first deployed during the Crater Sea War. 

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/pxx9e7u80t13m5f/KR-177.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pxx9e7u80t13m5f/KR-177.craft?dl=0)
